Code: EXEC SQL SELECT SUM(VALUE(PRM_TARIFARIO,0)), SUM(VALUE(VAL_DESCONTO,0)), SUM(VALUE(VLPRMLIQ,0)), SUM(VALUE(VLADIFRA,0)), SUM(VALUE(VLCUSEMI,0)), SUM(VALUE(VLIOCC,0)), SUM(VALUE(VLPRMTOT,0)), SUM(VALUE(VLPREMIO,0)), DTVENCTO FROM seguros.v1histoparc WHERE num_apolice = :NUM_APOLICE and nrendos = :NRENDOS and nrparcel = :NRPARCEL and operacao = :OPERACAO GROUP BY DTVENCTO END SQL
